Introduction
This topic contains information on evaluating musculoskeletal disabilities of the feet, including
selecting a DC for foot disabilities
identifying the digits of the foot
assigning separate evaluations for multiple foot disabilities
evaluating
arthritis of the minor joints of the toes
, and
plantar fasciitis
definition of metatarsalgia or Morton’s disease
, and
evaluating
metatarsalgia or Morton’s disease
, and
metatarsalgia and
plantar fasciitis
, and
pes planus
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Musculoskeletal Disabilities of the Extremities and Spine
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
